Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer

Class MasterAddressSyncer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.ZKListener
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer.ClientZKSyncer
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer.MasterAddressSyncer
@Private public class MasterAddressSyncer extends ClientZKSyncer
Tracks the active master address on server ZK cluster and synchronize them to client ZK cluster if changed
